Another Section

You can toggle the baseline grid overlay using the button in the top-right corner. This helps visualize how the typography aligns to the baseline grid.

Technical Details

The baseline grid is calculated using the baseline unit from the configuration. Each text element includes precise padding-top values to ensure perfect alignment.
